data.actual_result: The text entry box stays where it would if you were typing, but the keyboard isn't there. System settings: iOS 9.3.3, iPhone 6
data.expected_result: The text entry box goes down.
data.short_description: Text Entry Box stays where it would be if the keyboard was out even when it's away after accessing the camera roll with the keyboard out
data.steps_to_repro: - Press the text entry box. - Press teh paper clip icon. - Press the camera roll box. - Exit out of the camera roll. - Press the entry box. - Press outside of the text entry box.
